Text.Language: Ece~swpi ece~swpi e~jen t~a~ve m~peniwt eyouab n~ar,/ e~reuc papa abba (nim).
Shall be upon the head of our holy father, the archpriest, Pope Abba (...).

Comment.Language: If a metropolitan or bishop is present:

Text.Language: Nem pefkes~v/r n~litourgoc peniwt eyouab m~m/tropol/c (n~e~pickopoc) abba (nim).
And his partner in the liturgy, our holy father the metropolitan (Bishop) Abba (...).
